abstract: Credit Suisse announced Thursday that it was seeking to form a joint venture with a Chinese brokerage firm, Founder Securities.
snippet: Credit Suisse announced Thursday that it was seeking to form a joint venture with a Chinese brokerage firm, Founder Securities.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI  Amid signs that China may be opening its securities market to more foreign investment banks, Credit Suisse announced Thursday that it was seeking to form a joint venture with a Chinese brokerage firm, Founder Securities.

headline.main: Credit Suisse Pursuing a Partnership in the Chinese Market
headline.print_headline: Credit Suisse Pursuing a Partnership in the Chinese Market
